ygData.subject: RE: How did you guys start tinkering?
ygData.msgSnippet: Get Ready for ALOT of emails. Well at first level all the way up to 16th it can only be raised by buying a tool box and starting you tinkering. There are many
ygData.messageBody:
Get Ready for ALOT of emails. Well at first level all the way up to 16th
it can only be raised by buying a tool box and starting you tinkering. There
are many guides on the net one good one thou not complete is at
www.everlore.com. I suggest look there when you get a chance they have alot
of help there. But if you lack the time. Get alot of money saved up and at
16 buy tinker up as high as you can and then build Gnomish firewater until
its trivial then just start on the next best thing the list was passed out a
minute ago but if you didn't get it here ya go.


From: crys@...

Animated Bait = Cork, Spiket; Cost 4cp, Trivial at Level 50

Aqualung = fine coral mesh, silk lined steel helm,metal twine, gnomish
bolts, metal rod, fresh fish; Cost 250pp, Trivial at ??

Collapsible Fishing Pole = 3 metal rods, gnomish bolts; Cost 7pp, Trivial at
50

Compass = pie tin, skewers, water flask, static orb, cork; Cost 3pp, Triv at
50

Firewater = water flask, gnomish spirits; Cost 8sp, Triv at 50

Flameless Lantern = large lantern, twine, firewater; Cost 2pp, Triv at 68

Gemcutter = metal rod, diamond dust, cam, metal fastening, firewater,
grease; Cost ??, Triv at ??

Gnomish Fireworks = metal shaft, bat wing, firewater; Cost 2gp, Triv at 50

Mechanized Lockpicks = gear, sprocket, lockpick, rat ears; Cost 18pp, Triv
at ??

Rebreather = aqualung, lime coated meshing, shark skin tubing, platemail
helm, firewater, metal fastening; Cost ??, Triv at ??

Spyglass = collapsible fishing pole, bottle, twine, metal rod, reflective
shard; Cost 25pp, Triv at 95

Stalking Probe = 2 gears, bottle, metal rod, firewater; Cost 18pp, Triv at
102

Standard Bow Cam = gear, grease, gnomish bolts; Cost 15pp, Triv at 75


This is all from that tinkering page .. hope it helps...

Fanrick the Rogue Magician


-----Original Message-----
From: Steve Clary [mailto:sclary@...]
Sent: Monday, November 29, 1999 2:44 PM
To: eq_tinkering@onelist.com
Subject: [EQ_Tinkering] How did you guys start tinkering?


From: Steve Clary <sclary@...>

I know this has come up a dozen time but how did you guys start your
tinkerers? I just made my first gnome.

Reptus
Shady Rogue
